messages.subject: Re: Available conferences
messages.msgSnippet: ... Diana - you were sworn to secrecy!! Not a conference though, a coastal retreat, no speakers, just funshops and lots of crazy wild play! Planned for July
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "diana jenner" <hahamommy@...> wrote:
> I hear inklings of a possible get-together in BC Canada next summer!

Diana - you were sworn to secrecy!! Not a conference though, a coastal retreat, no
speakers, just funshops and lots of crazy wild play! Planned for July 2008, we're working
on exclusive use of a small beachside resort for radical unschooling families to hang out
together for 4 full days of play and chat and water fun with a distinctly Canadian spin!

And since we're letting cats out of bags, I think maybe the Alubuquerque tribe might have
something up their sleeves too...

Gillian
& Craig of Effie (7) and Fergus (3)
Victoria BC
g.c.123@...

> >

> >

> >

> >
> >Madison, WI is hosting their second 1 day unschooling conference next
> > February (unschoolingconference.com)
> >
> >It just keeps growing and growing and growing...

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Available conferences, was L&L Reg
messages.msgSnippet: Next year s LIFE is Good will be in Vancouver, WA Madison, WI is hosting their second 1 day unschooling conference next February (unschoolingconference.com) I
messages.messageBody:
Next year's LIFE is Good will be in Vancouver, WA

Madison, WI is hosting their second 1 day unschooling conference next
February (unschoolingconference.com)

I hear inklings of a possible get-together in BC Canada next summer!

It just keeps growing and growing and growing...
